mapper.insert: insert into EP_PAY_BASEINF values ( #{uId}, #{userNo}, #{wagesBase}, #{wagesPerf}, #{postPension}, #{otherPension}, #{endmBase}, #{mediBase}, #{unemBase}, #{emplBase}, #{mateBase}, #{houseBase}, #{probRatio}, #{welcoeNo}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{createdBy}, date_format(now(),'%y-%m-%d'), #{updatedBy}, date_format(now(),'%y-%m-%d') );
mapper.select: select cp.salary_top from EP_CLASSPARM_CTRL cp left join EP_CUST_INFO ci on cp.organ_no = ci.organ_no and cp.rank = ci.cust_class and cp.uid = ci.uid where ci.uid = #{uid} and ci.user_no = #{userNo};
